subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Officials in Oregon said an autopsy showed that the former Portland Trail Blazers center Kevin Duckworth died when his enlarged heart failed. Duckworth died Monday at 44 on the Oregon coast, where he was on a good-will tour for the team. The Oregon State Police said an autopsy concluded that Duckworth died of “hypertrophic cardiomyopathy with congestive heart failure.”.
